website_summaries.verdict: When you only need room for 1 person to fish on the ice, this insulated tent works great.
pros: Excellent insulation properties in both the roof and back panels
Uses a 300 denier fabric that will resist punctures and stand up to many seasons of use
More room inside for your gear than you might think for a 1-person ice fishing shelter
cons: Some quality control issues in shipping with missing parts

customer_reviews.title: just okay
customer_reviews.text: wish i would have boughten the flip over. this is a nice shanty, but took forever to put together and had a few missing parts that i had to buy at Ace Hardware. not so fun to unload everything out of the sled, just to flip the top out and get it set up. pulls fine on ice, but the second that you hit a little snow, it feels like there is 4 people riding it, while you're pulling it. i added the $50 Tracking kit, and it didn't help at all.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: EVO 2 IT -- Great design but poor QA-QC
customer_reviews.text: Really like the design -- must of had input from seasoned ice-fishermen. However, need to keep in mind its made in China... when first erected one front rods popped out of its hub and kept popping out... (faulting hub). Also one of the ceiling hub rods blew through the top corner... (poor sewing at the stressed end -- requires better reinforcement). In my opinion this tent was NOT erected and checked to confirm it functions properly at the manufacturing site or in USA before sent off to retailer. In summary, great design, but lacked Quality Controls... After some frustrating emails, Eskimo is sending new hub and rod; and I re-sewed the ceiling corner...
customer_reviews.author: Vic L.

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS IS CHINESE GARBAGE.
customer_reviews.text: This product is junk!! I have owned it since January used 5x keep finding little rips jn canvas seems to be a new 1 each time i use it now i have a pocket for the roof poles has blown out.and now iam stuck with this piece of junk becouse it past date of return i had a month do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Warren s.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality product
customer_reviews.text: As expected but hard to pull across snow covered ice by hand. It would be better with reinforced holes for the pull string. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Diana D.

customer_reviews.title: This shack is great very easy to put together and is very light ...
customer_reviews.text: This shack is great very easy to put together and is very light to load in and out of the pickup. Set up is very fast and easy with plenty of room to fish 3 8" holes. Stands up great in the wind as long as you stake it down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shanty
customer_reviews.text: Best Ice Shanty ever. A little more set up involved than a clam style shanty, but the extra room and comfortable seats are well worth it. Seller was great arranging for shipping as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dale S.

customer_reviews.title: Ice fishing fun
customer_reviews.text: Men in my house live it. Said it's a little hard to out up by yourself but still Love it
customer_reviews.author: betty

customer_reviews.title: Can be tricky in the wind
customer_reviews.text: he doesn’t think the quality of the fabric is as good as his old one. Great for standing up in (6 feet tall), but it is not as easy to move as a flip over style
customer_reviews.author: traveler

customer_reviews.title: It's eskimo it's awesome
customer_reviews.text: Well built loads of room comfy chair huge windows you couldn't ask for more in a single person sled. Super easy to set up and take down
customer_reviews.author: Chris Current

customer_reviews.title: ... room over a typical flip over one man is amazing. Set up is quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: The added room over a typical flip over one man is amazing. Set up is quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Z.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i love this thing easy to set up great unit can fish two people in with ease
customer_reviews.author: ROBIN  SHANTIE

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space
customer_reviews.text: Lot of space to fish. Best if you have a buddy along to load/unload. Directions for initial setting up could be better. Can easily throw a third person in.
customer_reviews.author: John Swartz

customer_reviews.title: Berry low quality
customer_reviews.text: Used it 2 times and the whole side ripped out
customer_reviews.author: michael morey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a great shanty to fish out of setting up is a little ruff on windy days !!
customer_reviews.author: John R Gardner Jr

customer_reviews.title: Other manufactures have much better sleds. I built steel runners with some flat ...
customer_reviews.text: This shelter is very roomy compared to the older versions of the flip design. The sled still takes up a fair portion of the shelter. If th sled were turned 90 degrees then it would give more room. Also the sled that is provided is fairly flimsy. It will need extreme care to last more than a season. I would have to do a revamp on the sled. Other manufactures have much better sleds. I built steel runners with some flat stock and 1/4" round. Big improvment on ice without snow.
customer_reviews.author: michael mccauley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to handle, plenty of room for us and gear
customer_reviews.author: Gary Beck

customer_reviews.title: The only model like it.
customer_reviews.text: I received this after the season so I haven't used it yet. I believe it will meet my expectattions
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Thielmann

customer_reviews.title: Modified to fit my needs
customer_reviews.text: First off I love the square footage and space you have to move around in the EVO1 but it can be a pain to pop up at first until you get the hang of it. I put mine on some skis to keep it from plowing through the snow and it helped a ton. I also gutted the and seat put a deluxe camp chair in it and its lighter and way more comfortable. Overall this shanty fits what I need and I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Big money grip

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could say something positive but this shelter is garbage. The poles fall out of the hub when the wind blows and collapses on your head. It's difficult to set up unless you're in the basement with no weather. The seams pull apart. I'm not sure I will ever buy another Eskimo product. My last Frabill lasted 10 years and then I sold it.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: It’s a pop up tent attached to a sled.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have bought a flip over instead. You might as well just get a pop up tent vs this. It’s basically a pop up tent attached to a sled. It’s a pain to put up and take down. On a windy day good luck if your alone. I like to hole hop and I rarely bother to set the thing up. Not my style I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ice shack!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this shack! It's compact, easy set up and tons of fishing room! The large oversized Windows make it easy to see tip ups too.
customer_reviews.author: brittany

product_meta.title: Eskimo Evo Ice Fishing Series
feature_bullets: Insulated Roof and back panels. Our IQ fabric covers the top and back of the EVO it. The black insulated material helps absorb and hold heat as well as reducing condensation
More fishable area. The EVO it gives you more fishable area than any comparable Sled style shelter by utilizing fiberglass poles and hub technology
The EVO it features two oversized side doors, making it easy to move yourself and all your gear in and out of the shelter
Self-tapping ice anchors. Easier to grip, and won't Bend under pressure
Better materials. 300 denier IceTight fabric with a 59% higher thread count than comparable shelters
